manifest.name: copy-webpack-plugin
manifest.description: Copy files and directories in webpack

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build:tests
scripts.test:nolint: npm run build && npm run build:tests && mocha compiled_tests/
scripts.build:tests: babel tests/ --out-dir compiled_tests/ && ncp tests/helpers compiled_tests/helpers
